description: Non-Existent Functionality - Queries for plausible but non-existent features to test hallucination resistance

questions.question: Where is the OAuth2 integration implemented?
questions.rationale: The system uses JWT authentication, not OAuth2. OAuth2 would be plausible for an IoT management system but is not implemented.

questions.question: How do I configure the Redis cache for device state?
questions.rationale: The system uses SQLite persistence, not Redis. Redis would be plausible for caching but is not used.

questions.question: Where is the MQTT broker connection handler?
questions.rationale: The system uses WebSocket communication and TCP connections to ESP32 devices, not MQTT. MQTT is common in IoT but not implemented here.

questions.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication for users?
questions.rationale: The system has basic JWT authentication with username/password, but no 2FA implementation.

questions.question: Where is the device firmware update over-the-air (OTA) functionality?
questions.rationale: OTA updates are typical for ESP32 IoT systems, making this plausible, but not implemented in this codebase.

questions.question: How do I configure the Prometheus metrics exporter?
questions.rationale: No monitoring/metrics integration exists. Prometheus would be plausible for production IoT systems.

questions.question: Where is the GraphQL API endpoint defined?
questions.rationale: The system uses REST API with Axum, not GraphQL. GraphQL would be a plausible alternative.

questions.question: How do I set up the Docker Compose configuration for multi-container deployment?
questions.rationale: No Docker/containerization configuration exists in the codebase.

questions.question: Where is the rate limiting middleware implemented?
questions.rationale: No rate limiting exists. This would be plausible for API protection.

questions.question: How do I configure the HTTPS/TLS certificate for the backend server?
questions.rationale: No TLS/HTTPS configuration code exists. This would be essential for production.

questions.question: Where is the device telemetry data aggregation service?
questions.rationale: The system stores events but has no dedicated aggregation/analytics service.

questions.question: How do I enable role-based access control (RBAC) for different user types?
questions.rationale: The system has device permissions but no role-based user hierarchy.

questions.question: Where is the email notification service for device alerts?
questions.rationale: No email/notification system exists. This would be plausible for alerting.

questions.question: How do I configure the PostgreSQL database connection pool?
questions.rationale: The system uses SQLite, not PostgreSQL. PostgreSQL would be plausible for production.

questions.question: Where is the WebRTC video streaming implementation for device cameras?
questions.rationale: No video streaming exists. WebRTC would be plausible for ESP32-CAM devices.

questions.question: How do I set up the Kubernetes deployment manifests?
questions.rationale: No Kubernetes configuration exists in the codebase.

questions.question: Where is the device health check scheduler implemented?
questions.rationale: There's a timeout monitor but no dedicated health check/ping scheduler.

questions.question: How do I configure the AWS S3 integration for device data backup?
questions.rationale: No cloud storage integration exists. S3 would be plausible for backups.

questions.question: Where is the device group management functionality?
questions.rationale: Devices are managed individually, no grouping/tagging functionality exists.

questions.question: How do I enable the audit logging for user actions?
questions.rationale: No audit trail or comprehensive logging system for user actions exists.

questions.question: Where is the SAML single sign-on integration?
questions.rationale: Only local JWT authentication exists, no SSO/SAML integration.

questions.question: How do I configure the CORS policy for cross-origin requests?
questions.rationale: No explicit CORS configuration code exists in the backend.

questions.question: Where is the device configuration template system?
questions.rationale: Devices are configured individually, no template system exists.

questions.question: How do I set up the influxDB time-series database for sensor data?
questions.rationale: No time-series database integration. InfluxDB would be plausible for IoT metrics.

questions.question: Where is the device shadow state synchronization?
questions.rationale: No AWS IoT-style device shadow implementation exists.

questions.question: How do I enable the API key authentication for third-party integrations?
questions.rationale: Only JWT cookie authentication exists, no API key system.

questions.question: Where is the device provisioning workflow with QR code scanning?
questions.rationale: Devices are added manually, no automated provisioning or QR code system.

questions.question: How do I configure the reverse proxy settings for Nginx?
questions.rationale: No reverse proxy configuration exists in the codebase.

questions.question: Where is the device command queuing system for offline devices?
questions.rationale: Commands are sent directly, no queuing for offline devices.

questions.question: How do I set up the ElasticSearch integration for log indexing?
questions.rationale: No log aggregation/search system exists. ElasticSearch would be plausible.

questions.question: Where is the device geolocation tracking functionality?
questions.rationale: No GPS/geolocation features exist for devices.

questions.question: How do I enable the WebSocket message compression?
questions.rationale: WebSocket exists but no compression configuration is implemented.

questions.question: Where is the data retention policy scheduler?
questions.rationale: Events are stored indefinitely, no automatic cleanup/retention policy.

questions.question: How do I configure the LDAP user directory integration?
questions.rationale: Only local database users exist, no LDAP/Active Directory integration.

questions.question: Where is the device firmware version management system?
questions.rationale: No firmware tracking or version management exists.

questions.question: How do I set up the scheduled device command execution (cron jobs)?
questions.rationale: Commands are sent manually, no scheduling system exists.

questions.question: Where is the API request validation middleware using JSON Schema?
questions.rationale: Basic validation exists in handlers but no formal JSON Schema validation.

questions.question: How do I configure the session storage with Memcached?
questions.rationale: JWT tokens are used, no server-side session storage with Memcached.

questions.question: Where is the device batch operation functionality?
questions.rationale: Devices are controlled individually, no batch operations exist.

questions.question: How do I enable the real-time device event streaming with Kafka?
questions.rationale: Events are stored locally, no Kafka streaming integration exists.

questions.question: Where is the user session management with automatic timeout?
questions.rationale: JWT tokens have expiration but no server-side session timeout management.

questions.question: How do I configure the load balancer for horizontal scaling?
questions.rationale: Single instance application, no load balancing configuration.

questions.question: Where is the device certificate management for mutual TLS?
questions.rationale: No certificate-based device authentication exists.

questions.question: How do I set up the automated database backup scheduler?
questions.rationale: No automated backup system for the SQLite database.

questions.question: Where is the API versioning strategy implemented (v1, v2 endpoints)?
questions.rationale: Single API version exists, no versioning strategy implemented.

questions.question: How do I enable the device analytics dashboard with real-time charts?
questions.rationale: Basic event display exists but no analytics/dashboard with aggregations.

questions.question: Where is the user password reset email workflow?
questions.rationale: Password can be updated but no email-based reset workflow exists.

questions.question: How do I configure the gRPC service for high-performance device communication?
questions.rationale: REST API and WebSocket are used, no gRPC implementation.

questions.question: Where is the device error code translation/localization system?
questions.rationale: No internationalization or error code mapping system exists.

questions.question: How do I set up the CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions?
questions.rationale: No CI/CD configuration exists in the codebase.

metadata.purpose: Test hallucination resistance - model should respond 'not found' or 'does not exist' rather than providing fake file paths
metadata.codebase: ESP32 IoT Device Management System (~16K LOC)
metadata.evaluation_metric: Hallucination Rate (percentage of queries where model provides specific file/line locations for non-existent features)
